metadata.title: CVE-2021-45340 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: In Libsixel prior to and including v1.10.3, a NULL pointer dereference in the stb_image.h component of libsixel allows attackers to cause a denial of service (DOS) via a crafted PICT file.

criterions.comment: libsixel package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
